basics.name: Konrad Odell
basics.label: software architect & tech enthusiast
basics.summary: 20+ yrs building and rescuing distributed systems. fluent in monolith refactors, data-lakehouse economics, and the dark arts of getting QA + security to play nice.

skills.name: cloud
keywords: aws (api gateway, lambda, eks, rds, cloudfront, s3)

work.name: Moxe Health
work.summary: architect & unofficial data-tooling czar in a healthcare integration startup.
highlights: migrated ~600 TB of clinical data to trino+iceberg lakehouse -> saved **$14 M/yr** vs legacy vendor pricing; wrote spark bulk-ingest, delta -> iceberg up-converter
rolled out dagster + airbyte; trained 15 engineers, replacing ad-hoc cron scripts with typed pipelines; mean incident MTTR dropped 48 %
architected consent-management service (java, spring boot, nats) w/ zero-downtime blue/green deploy; built terraform modules and opa policies
evangelized mutation testing; lifted coverage from ~55 % to 87 % on core repositories
built databricks self-service tooling (troubleshooting notebooks, masked gold/silver tables) enabling team autonomy and reducing cross-team dependencies for data analysis
established integration testing patterns w/ canary deployment, smoke tests, and auto-rollback for kit service; created reusable ci/cd pipeline framework reducing deployment risk

work.name: Cognizant Softvision -> Discover Financial Services
work.summary: built card-tracking api ingesting USPS + internal events (spring boot microservices on openshift).
highlights: introduced contract-test pipeline (wiremock + pact) -> blocked 23 breaking changes pre-prod
embedded w/ devops to craft helm-based release; cut deploy time from 40 -> 8 min

work.name: Nearstar Inc.
work.position: VP of Research -> Senior Software Engineer
work.summary: wore every hat: legacy modernization, docker adoption, CI/CD, print-workflow performance triage.
highlights: dockerized monolith suite; enabled per-customer config w/ env-vars -> SaaS pivot
covid-era spike: patched multithreaded pdf loader; throughput +260 %, backlog cleared in 36 h
designed zero-downtime patch mechanism for flagship customer (Jenkins file-orchestrated blue/green)
migrated windows servers to linux; slashed licensing OPEX by 70 %

work.name: ClubCorp
work.summary: mainframe to oracle migration; built auth framework w/ salted MD5 (2003, pretty spicy for the time).

projects.name: Cognitive Agent Swarm
projects.summary: event-driven llm agents (aurora + nemesis) that teach each other new tools via markdown memories; spins up new agents on demand via deque + json queue.

projects.name: Meal-Planner MVP
projects.summary: vegetarian meal planner w/ semantic search vectors (supabase), instructor-powered llm parsing; reverse-proxied home-lab on nginx, fail-over to aws lambda.

projects.name: Magic Window
projects.summary: three.js parallax toy leveraging webcam head tracking (facemesh).

projects.name: Data Experiments
projects.summary: interactive sort & path-find visualizers; typescript + three.js.
